attributes.review: This app is so scary. The notifications almost gave me a heart attack. It was SO loud and unexpected. The app has random things in it that make no sense what’s so ever 😨. I do not recommend.
attributes.title: Wow

attributes.review: There’s a lot of glitches in this app. When I first opened the app disturbing images of animals and kids popped up.
attributes.title: Glitch

attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible, when I opened the app, I saw something that scared me for life! It’s was a big Cheeto, staring into my soul, I passed out, and I will be scared for the rest of my life!
attributes.title: Soggy Cheeto

attributes.review: I give this app zero stars because it is biased and doesn’t have the truth. Trump is also not responsible to keep this app up to date eaither.

attributes.review: okay i downloaded this app and as soon as i opened it, it crashed! now every time i try opening it, it crashes and takes me back to my home screen. ffs, fix this bug. i was looking forward to using this app but im disappointed. wish i could give it zero stars 🤣🤣🤣

attributes.review: This app is filled with fake news and trump propaganda. Trump is a blatantly racist, sexist, misogynistic, transphobic man but yet this app seems to claim the opposite by elevating trump in a positive light. I don’t recommend this app for anyone with an inkling of intelligence.
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: I got this hysterical app because I wanted to see what the cheetoh puff was up too. Yup huge regret so disappointed and mad. I hate it there so please don’t get it :)
attributes.title: Stop, Lemme pray for you

attributes.review: This app sucksss ! It’s making nothing in my phone work all my apps are locked and they kick me out !
